name: EC2NetworkInterfaceAssociation
description: Describes a network interface association for an Elastic Network Interface (ENI). AWS::EC2::NetworkInterface takes an object of this type in its Association property.

properties.name: AttachmentID
properties.description: The ID of the network interface attachment.

properties.name: InstanceID
properties.description: The ID of the instance attached to the network interface.

properties.name: PublicIp
properties.description: The address of the Elastic IP address bound to the network interface.

properties.name: IpOwnerId
properties.description: The ID of the Elastic IP address owner.
